text: several thousands refugees and migrants
now find themselves confused trapped and
even stranded right here as they attempt
to get into Hungary a lot of them spent
the morning queuing at an official
border point over there but they found
that they weren't getting in so in the
last few minutes people have streamed
through here simply in search of
somewhere to cross if you just have a
look through here right next to the
border fence you can see people standing
around and people walking around there
trying to see if they can get into
Hungary but that fence is closed this is
registration number one this is not it
neither does these refugees about 100
meters from the border have decided to
throw away all of their food and their
water and to hold a sit-in protest here
they've written these signs in the last
few minutes there we are there's one no
food and here's another one here no food
no water until open border so their
message is clear they will stay here
including the children and will not move
until somehow Hungary decides to open
the border and let them through
